scripts.build: esbuild src/handlers/transparent-proxy/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/index.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild src/handlers/user/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/users-handler.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild src/handlers/auth/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/auth-handler.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/define/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/define.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/create/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/create.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/verify/.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/verify.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:auth: esbuild src/handlers/auth/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/auth-handler.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:auth:create: esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/create/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/create.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:auth:define: esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/define/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/define.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:auth:verify: esbuild src/handlers/auth/triggers/verify/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/verify.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:transparent-proxy: esbuild src/handlers/transparent-proxy/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/index.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:user: esbuild src/handlers/user/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outfile=dist/users-handler.mjs --format=esm --external:buffer --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.docker:build-all: pnpm docker:build:auth && pnpm docker:build:users && pnpm docker:build:proxy && pnpm docker:build:define && pnpm docker:build:create && pnpm docker:build:verify
scripts.docker:login:ecr: dotenv -- bash -c 'aws ecr get-login-password --region ${AWS_REGION} | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin ${AWS_ACCOUNT_ID}.dkr.ecr.${AWS_REGION}.amazonaws.com'
scripts.docker:push-all: pnpm docker:push:auth && pnpm docker:push:users && pnpm docker:push:proxy && pnpm docker:push:define && pnpm docker:push:create && pnpm docker:push:verify
scripts.deploy:docker: pnpm build && pnpm docker:build-all && dotenv pnpm docker:login:ecr && dotenv pnpm docker:push-all && terraform apply -auto-approve
